publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2179 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 8th Report (Session 2) of the Finance Committee, Stage 2 of the 2005-06 Budget Process—That the Parliament notes the 8th Report 2004 (Session 2) of the Finance Committee on Stage 2 of the 2005-06 Budget Process (SP Paper 257) and refers the report and its recommendations to the Scottish Executive for consideration.

S2M-2179 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 8th Report (Session 2) of the Finance Committee, Stage 2 of the 2005-06 Budget Process—That the Parliament notes the 8th Report 2004 (Session 2) of the Finance Committee on Stage 2 of the 2005-06 Budget Process (SP Paper 257) and refers the report and its recommendations to the Scottish Executive for consideration.
